name: Search & Autocorrect
plugin_instructions:
- Place the element and input on the page and set it to Attribute ID.
- Select the checkbox to match from the input box and paste your input ID in the Input Box ID field.
- Place the Repeating Group and set the data source of the info it's being searched for.
